subject: Danone
more-info: to ensure that its sourcing practices are responsible for consumers, producers and farmers alike. This involves sourcing key ingredients locally (i.e. in the country where the products are sold), a practice which Danone is expanding every year, particularly for plant-based products and fruits & vegetables.
